bioconda.name: translatorx
bioconda.summary: Multiple alignment of nucleotide sequences guided by amino acid information

biocontainers.name: translatorx
biocontainers.summary: Multiple alignment of nucleotide sequences guided by amino acid information

biotools.summary: TranslatorX is a web-server designed to align protein coding nucleotide sequences based on their corresponding amino acid translations rather than nucleotide alignments.

bioschemas.name: TranslatorX
bioschemas.summary: TranslatorX is a web-server designed to align protein coding nucleotide sequences based on their corresponding amino acid translations rather than nucleotide alignments.
